name: Grace Children Ministries
briefDescription: Grace Children Ministries is a non-profitable organization, dedicated to help the Orphans, Widows, Leprosy, HIV People Etc. it was founded in 2006, registered in 2008.Legal Status: A Society Registered under Public Societies Registration Act 1860 | Regd.
